name: Rock Rain 2
description:
After surviving a mountain earthquake, you are ready to rest. But then ... it happens again!

Second part of Rock Rain, the game in which you have to survive a rain of rocks and reach the exit to survive. This time you will have power-ups, which will allow you to enjoy powers for a limited time.

The game

Rock Rain 2 is an endless game. When you get the floating exit, you'll begin a new level until all your lives are over. Each rock and each finish level will increment your score.

Experience

Rock Rain 2 have EXPERIENCES, an achievement open library designed for GP2X and PC. You can win this achievements (500 points, 18 exps) if install the Exp Application.

Local multiplayer

There is a local multiplayer mode, only cooperative, at this moment.

Language

English and Spanish.

Controls GAMEPADKEYSLEFTLEFTLEFTRIGHTRIGHTRIGHTJUMPAZCANCELBXPAUSEBACKESCAPE
